widget:CodeSection.description: Contact chips represent contact information that users have for people in a compact way. They are invoked and inserted into a text field (usually the To field) when the user starts typing a contact's name, sees the contact's addresses, and selects the correct one. Contact chips can be added directly to a text field from a menu of contacts. Contact chips efficiently confirm that the user will be sending their message to the correct person.
